about_the_game:
In this visual novel you're a voice in a schizophrenic heads of dynasty Müller. You pass from generation to generation and you control your schizophrenic, talking sometimes with him. The important thing is, you shouldn't let your schizophrenic die without offspring, otherwise you'll die with him.


That's why this game is so beautiful:

✔You're a voice in a schizophrenic's head;
✔ABSOLUTELY EVERY decision you make matters;
✔Original story;
✔A lot of references to history, art, psychology, philosophy .
✔You'll get to see completely different historical epochs;
✔Black-and-white style;
✔Intellectual game;
✔New stories after every big update!!!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12.6+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

You pass from generation to generation and you countrol your schizophrenic, talking sometimes with him.
